attributes.action: End the sale of tobacco products in shops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to call for an end to legal tobacco sales. Stopping people smoking in work places is a half-measure, smokers can still smoke themselves to death outside pubs and workplaces, and of course in their homes.  i wish i did not smoke, and i'm sure i am not the only smoker who wishes that tobacco products were rendered unavailable - it may be the only way for some of us to stop.
